title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.2 - Areas of responsibility and oversight requiring use of personal services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.2 - Areas of responsibility and oversight requiring use of personal services

State Regulations

The corporation's functions and responsibilities and its
customary methods of operations generally call for the use of personal services
with respect to architecture and design, hotel management and operations, property management and operations, investment management, legal, accounting, construction, construction management, repair and cleaning. The president may
from time to time determine that the provision of personal services is
appropriate in other areas of the corporation's operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2052.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
